service.name: TweetUM
service.description: Given a Twitter username, it returns the FOAF-based interest profile of the corresponding learner.

service.name: Location estimation of images
service.description: Requires as input a Flickr id (NSID) and then generates a location profile for the given user based on up to the most recently uploaded 250 images (utilizing more images would also possible of course). The output is a bag of records; one record for each found image, with image meta-data and estimated location: the date the image was taken at, the latitude and longitude the image was taken at (if available from Flickr), the estimated latitude and longitude as determined by our approach and the error in kilometres between the true and the estimated location (if available).

service.name: Language Detection in Microblogs
service.description: The set of languages a learner understands is an attribute of the learner profile which can be derived from the learner's posts on Twitter. Given a Twitter username, this service returns the language profile of the corresponding learner.
